fullText: This spirited stage adaptation of the 1992 Disney movie musical about the newsboys strike of 1899 has enough old-fashioned pizzazz to charm families and Broadway tourists.
dtliExcerpt: This spirited stage adaptation of the 1992 Disney movie musical about the newsboys strike of 1899 has enough old-fashioned pizzazz to charm families and Broadway tourists.
